definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: Silver-coated carbonyl iron powder was prepared by using electroless plating method.
sentences.chinese: 用化学镀法，甲醛为还原剂，制备镀银羰基铁粉。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare praziquantel implants and investigate the in vitro drug release.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备胸腺五肽微球并对其体外释放进行考察。

sentences.english: Water-soluble carboxymethyl chitosan was prepared from dried shrimp shells.
sentences.chinese: 以虾壳为原料，制备了水溶性羧甲基壳聚糖。

sentences.english: The factors were studied which affected the preparation of PFS in this method.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氯酸钠氧化法制备PFS的影响因素。

sentences.english: Result Determin the best prescription approach and prepare the samples.
sentences.chinese: 结果确定处方最佳工艺并制备样品。

sentences.english: This article describes briefly the preparation technology and the main performance of waterborne high temperature anticorrosion coatings.
sentences.chinese: 简述了水性高温防腐涂料的制备工艺及主要性能。

sentences.english: The Hippiphae Rimniodesc(HR) mixture microcapsule was manufactured through suspensoid cross-link method.
sentences.chinese: 采用悬浮交联法制备沙棘混合粉的微胶囊。

sentences.english: BCN thin films were grown by RF reactive sputtering.
sentences.chinese: 用射频反应溅射法制备出BCN薄膜。

sentences.english: Nano-crystallization of metallic glasses is an effective way to prepare nanocrystalline materials.
sentences.chinese: 而非晶合金晶化法是纳米晶材料的主要制备方法之一。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare the helicid hydrophile matrix tablet.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备神衰果素亲水凝胶缓释骨架片。

sentences.english: By using the method provided by the invention, the soap containing the tannin can be prepared.
sentences.chinese: 利用本发明提供的方法，可制备含有单宁酸的香皂。

sentences.english: The research aimed to study the preparation of activated carbon with Macadamia shell.
sentences.chinese: 研究以废弃澳洲坚果壳为原料的活性炭制备。

sentences.english: PVD process is an important method for manufacturing flaky aluminium nano powder.
sentences.chinese: PVD法是目前制备纳米片状铝粉的主要方法。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a wheat germ nutrient flour and its preparation method.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种麦胚营养粉及其制备方法。

sentences.english: So that a new way to produce high-purity manganese carbonate is opened up.
sentences.chinese: 从而为高纯度碳酸锰的制备开辟了一条新的途径。

sentences.english: The foam concrete block was prepared by self-made compound protein foam agent.
sentences.chinese: 以自制复合型蛋白质为发泡剂，制备泡沫混凝土砌块。

definition: components/individual parts making up a compound
